TableSpec.Name: MIMED Email Address
TableSpec.Description: Stores information about usr um UMHSEMAILADDRESS records
TableSpec.Author: UM Dev

BooleanField.Description: Indicates this email address is the primary email address.
BooleanField.Name: ISPRIMARY

BooleanField.Description: Indicates this email address should not receive emails.
BooleanField.Name: DONOTEMAIL

SequenceField.Description: Stores the user-defined sequence for email addresses on a constituent.
SequenceField.Name: SEQUENCE

TextField.Description: Contains additional comments about the information source.
TextField.Name: INFOSOURCECOMMENTS

DateField.Description: The date the email address becomes valid.
DateField.Name: STARTDATE

DateField.Description: The date the email address becomes invalid.
DateField.Name: ENDDATE

BooleanField.Description: Indicates this email address is confidential.
BooleanField.Name: ISCONFIDENTIAL

CheckConstraint.Name: CK_USR_UMHS_EMAILADDRESS_ENDDATEINVALIDIFPRIMARY
CheckConstraint.CheckExpression: ISPRIMARY=0 or (ISPRIMARY = 1 and ENDDATE is null)
